actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to provide for establishment of a National Traffic Safety Administration, and for other purposes.
short_title: National Traffic Safety Improvement Act of 1983

summary.text: National Traffic Safety Improvement Act of 1983 - Renames the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration in the Department of Transportation, the National Traffic Safety Administration. Consolidates specified programs. Requires the Administrator to report directly to the Secretary of Transportation.

titles.title: National Traffic Safety Improvement Act of 1983
A bill to provide for establishment of a National Traffic Safety Administration, and for other purposes.
